author: prbuzz.com
title: Fittsmile Launches Facebook Page
text:
July 2, 2015 - Elkhart, Indiana -- Fittsmile, a renowned name when it comes to providing various smartphone accessories is now available on Facebook. Through Facebook page like, people will learn about the company and its products. Experts are of the view that the Facebook is a great platform to interact with the customers effectively and informing them about latest happenings in the company.
When contacted Imre Luht, founder and CEO of a company said, "We are happy to announce that now we own a Facebook page. Social media plays a vital role in communication with customers. Now you just need to like our page and you will be informed about all the latest products and offers. You can contact us and ask any queries through our Facebook page." He further added, "I hope with the launch of our Facebook page we will be able to make our relation better with the customers."
 The Facebook page has been activated and many people has liked it .The number of likes are expected to increase at tremendous pace in future. The company will also share facts and information related to technology and camera from around the world. The latest post shared via Facebook is about â€˜Facebook's Moments App To Help Friends Share Event Photo Albums'
 The company is currently providing a flexible tripod that is specially designed for taking pictures with iPhone. The tripod has flexible legs, coated with foam. The legs can be tied around any object easily. With flexible legs iPhone can be angled properly for making photos.
About Fittsmile
Fittsmile is a young product development company founded in 2014 and It's currently develops easy to use smartphone photography related accessories . Fittsmile is devoted to make people smile through its product development and excellent customer service.
